name: Interfearence
description:
You are the hacker. You are the virus.
Take over control of a computer by shooting it's software to hell. But damaging the system causes it to become unstable.

You will experience more and more bugs & glitches throughout the game. Some of them benefit you others may get you in trouble or mess with your senses.

>System.out.println("Good Luck");

Controls
Move with WASD and shoot with your mouse.

Rating & Comments
This game is part of the GMTK 2020 Gamejam. Please help us by rating and commenting our game. Thank you!

Bugs
Apparently there can be issues with multiple connected screens running different resolutions, which could not be fixed in time.

Everything, inlcuding art, sound and music, was created in the 48 hours of the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
